purpose: To provide a centralized and curated collection of resources, tools, and references related to Azure OpenAI and large language models.
principle: Aggregates links and information on Azure OpenAI, LLMs, and related technologies, serving as a community-driven resource repository.
reusability: Can be used as a reference guide for developers and researchers interested in Azure OpenAI and LLMs, offering links to tools, libraries, and documentation.
limitations: Primarily a collection of resources; does not provide direct implementations or APIs.
